page.title: 04FALSGRAVE SURGERY
page.content: Dr.Oldroyd covers an area including Scarborough,Scalby,Seamer and Eastfield.20% of his patients are senior citizens.In a period of three years the practice has grown from one surgery to three adjoining buildings, and one to five nursing staff. Even with experienced help paper work still gets out of hand-15 part time secretaries.Five doctors,Four on surgery duty on a rota.A lady doctor covers morning surgery. In all 25 hours surgery duty each week,plus 25 hours on call plus hospital visits. A number of patients not in the area are still prepared to travel 20 miles to the surgery.The most common illnesses at present time are chicken pox, measles, viruses, earache, heart trouble, baby problems,injections, sore throats and fractures.
